metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13345 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The cachemgr.cgi web module of Squid through 4.7 has XSS via the user_nameor auth parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13345` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squid - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.2
squid-cgi - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.2
squid-common - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.2
squid-purge - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.2
squid3 - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.2
squidclient - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squid3 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.27-1ubuntu1.2').
